name: Dstroy II
description:
Dstroy 2 is a bomberman game prototype,  playable from 1 to 4 players on the same screen.
It will have two modes,  Adventures (solo or coop) and Tournaments (Vs 2 to 4 players). For now we're only working on the local Tournament part.

An online mode might only be consider if the game/ prototype get enough attention from players (it's difficult and takes time to do).

The prototype(s) is available for free (+ donation soon if you wish to while we'll be working on it).  We will try to release a new version at least once every three months.

If a final game version is one day release, the same "free to play + donation" approach should be kept. (so  the maximum of players can still enjoy the game, while helping us if they can or want to). But that might change too. We're not there yet anyway.

The menus are available in five languages already! Contact us if you wish to help and add yours. You'll get your name in the credits (when we'll add them in the game).

On top of the Itch.io forum we created, you can interact with us on Discord, plus the classics Mastodon, Twitter, Diaspora and Facebook (Fully bUgged or Dstroy 2 page),
